newsletterimagesdotcleargif newsletterimagesdotcleargif Dear Member This is one of our favorite times of the year With the holiday rush behind us and the spring still several chilly weeks away February is a wonderful month to settle down indoors with all those books youve had on your reading list In this issue of the Readers Advantage Newsletter enrich your reading with a closer look at some authors you know and an introduction to some we think you should know about And dont forget to look in our Great Reads section where our fiction buyer Sessalee Hensley has made her choice of great fiction titles out this month Youll find all this and more enough to make you almost wish February would last longer so cozy up and enjoy this month of reading newsletterimagesdotcleargif
